name: The Glitcher and The Bug
description:
A very early version of what will come next.

All assets, music and sound effects made by me.

If the game is slow, press "I" to disable the effects or change the "SleepMargin" to 15 in the options.ini file

Press Alt + Enter  = Switch to full screen.

Right Click to Dash ----- Dash goes where you go

move - WASD

Press "W" to go up a small hill

If you press "W" right after jumping, you'll get an extra boost.

shift + Left Click - Throw sword

shift + W - Fly and Charge Mana

shift + S - Charge Live

P to pause the game

Press "Q" when the game is paused, to go to the Main Menu

Press M to show a very basic minimap

Press "O" to save when you are on a floating plataform

The old man doesn't speak at the moment. By defeating him he will give you the power to throw the sword. (A message will be displayed explaining this in the future).

Some skills will be obtained as you play.
